WRITING.TEXT: Yes, bought a box from Asda today to give to my mum and dad with tea. Dads word on mince pies is the be all and end all
its a sign of worse things to come, I suspect

WRITING.TITLE: None of the coffee shops in my area do a decent mince pie, but I've seen at least three places with 'Mince pie muffins' as their seasonal offering
WRITING.TEXT: We really are living in a broken Britain
